search.custom: * By default, it brings back all rows where the column contains what you're lookin' for. You can use operators like: = (equals), != (ain't equal), > (greater than), < (less than) or ! (don't contain) at the start of yer search string. You can also look fer multiple values by splittin' 'em with a comma.

detail.description: This'll explain in more detail how user '{0}' left the game.

reasons.another: The user done directly connected to 'nother server without first disconnectin' from this one.
reasons.banned: The user was banned by a staff member with the given reason.
reasons.config: While connectin', the server's configuration was unable to load, causin' the user to get rejected.
reasons.crash: The user's game crashed with the given error message.
reasons.disconnected: The user disconnected from the server by typin' 'disconnect' in the F8 console or somethin' similar.
reasons.doors: The server tried to synchronize doors with the client but failed, so it kicked the user as it can't recover from this here error.
reasons.editor: The player opened their Rockstar Editor which automatically leaves the server y'all are currently in.
reasons.exited: The user done left the game by typin' 'quit' in the F8 console or pressin' ALT and F4 or somethin' like that.
reasons.global: The system reckoned that the user was up to somethin' fishy and slapped 'em with a global OP-FW ban.
reasons.job: The user's job priority done run out. This means they was waitin' in the line too long for the job priority, so the system booted 'em outta the queue.
reasons.kicked: The user got kicked by a staff member with the reason they gave.
reasons.overflow: Safety measure by FiveM to keep them pesky cheaters from floodin' your server with events.
reasons.reloading_game: The user loaded up a single-player game by usin' the 'localGame' command in the F8 console or somethin' like that.
reasons.restart: The user got kicked by the server 'cause it was fixin' to restart.
reasons.timeout: The user's connection to the server timed out. This usually happens when the internet connection drops out.
reasons.unknown: Ain't got no detailed description available. You might wanna ask a developer for more help.

detail.title: Detailed disconnect reason

logs.diff_label: Time passed since log entry below

If a player’s got multiple bans, it usually means they’re tied to another player, which automatically slaps their ban(s) onto this player. To lift all them bans off this player, you might have to unban ’em a few times and untangle ’em from each other.

staff_statistics.description_chinese: A thorough account of your doin's for societal harmony and progress, watched over by the Party for everyone's good. Don't forget, every move ya make shows your dedication to our shared future.
staff_statistics.footer: Y'all's actions help out with the success and growth of OP-FW. Through the trusty systems of OP-Framework, your hard work gets noticed and celebrated as part of our shared progress. Teamwork gets things done, and dedication builds excellence. Glory to the OP-FW!
staff_statistics.footer_chinese: Everythin' y'all do shows your loyalty and commitment to the Party. Under the watchful eyes of the system, your contributions are recorded and celebrated as part of our shared progress. Obedience keeps things runnin' smooth, and vigilance guarantees prosperity. Glory to the CCP!
staff_statistics.level_0_description: Though y'all have set foot upon the staff path, yer potential's still sleepin' and unshaped. You pick up knowledge from the whispers of mentors and watch the realm's energies swirl 'round ya with curiosity. The seeds of greatness lie within yer grasp, waitin' for the moment y'all step forward to claim 'em.
staff_statistics.level_10_description: Legends speak of yer transcendent ascension, a beacon whose mere presence hushes the most turbulent storms. The brilliance of yer staff’s energy resonates through every corner, forgin' unbreakable unity among those under yer watch. At this pinnacle of mortal power, y'all shape the realm’s destiny with each resolute decree.
staff_statistics.level_1_description: At last, the first sparks of staff magic shimmer in yer hands, guidin' yer responses to minor server troubles. Y'all stand ready to calm the occasional squabble or quell fleetin' unrest, eager to prove yer worth. The arcane bond grows stronger with each call for assistance, ignitin' the promise of higher mastery.
staff_statistics.level_2_description: Embracin' the subtle currents that shape the server, you skillfully juggle reports and disciplin' steps with emergin' talent. Chaos trembles as your collected demeanor and quick resolutions keep the peace intact. Each action weaves you deeper into the realm’s tapestry, fortifyin' your resolve to safeguard its harmony.
staff_statistics.level_3_description: Your command of arcane wards and banishin' incantations anchors the server in a steady calm. Troublemakers find themselves thwarted by your vigilance, and your glowin' staff stands as a beacon of authority. Even in the face of lurkin' shadows, your unwavering dedication transforms turmoil into triumph.
staff_statistics.level_4_description: From the darkest corners, you stand watch, attuned to the faintest flicker of mischief that threatens the realm. Swift retributions and precise interventions embody your role as a stalwart guardian, ensurin' no foe lingers long in your domain. The veil between order and chaos remains safely mended under your vigilant gaze.
staff_statistics.level_5_description: Celestial forces guide your judgments, empowerin' you to enforce harmony with cosmic grace. The realm looks to you for balanced decrees, trustin' in your ability to subdue conflict and uplift those in need. With every day, your mastery of astral energies grows, illuminatin' the way for staff and players alike.
staff_statistics.level_6_description: Yer staff's got that infernal might hummin', banishin' them disruptive forces quicker'n a cat on a hot tin roof. Folks shiver at the mere mention of yer name, knowin' full well yer wrath ain't sparin' no one who dares mess with the realm. But even with all that power, ya keep a keen eye on justice, makin' sure it's dished out fair and square.
staff_statistics.level_7_description: Shinin' with divine authority, ya rally the realm's defenders and nip unrest in the bud before it can take hold. Tales of yer legendary deeds spread far and wide, cementin' yer spot as a guidin' star for all. In yer capable hands, the server's fate stays bright and steady, standin' firm against the darkness out yonder.
staff_statistics.level_8_description: Ya tread the line 'tween light and dark, readin' them hidden threads of chaos before they kick up a fuss. Quick freezes and expert kicks show yer dedication to keepin' the peace, givin' no quarter to lingerin' threats. The blend of yer subtlety and might ensures that all who dwell in yer domain do so in harmony.
staff_statistics.level_9_description: Through countless skirmishes, yer mastery done surpassed mortal limits, mixin' strategic smarts with an unyieldin' moral compass. Trolls and troublemakers vanish in yer wake, each ban or mute an artful stroke of balanced retribution. In this lofty station, yer dedication stands as a testament to the realm's unbreakable resilience.
staff_statistics.title: Staff Statistics

statistics.airlifts_details: Count of airlifts over to the hospital.

statistics.pawn_details: Combined revenue from all them Pawn Shop sales.

statistics.shots_fired_details: Amount of shots fired (that dealt damage) from all weapons that shoot bullets (no melee, etc.).
